Tencent's Riot Games to lay off about 11% of staffTencent Holdings' Riot Games plans to lay off 530 employees, or about 11% of its staff globally, the online gaming company said on Monday in a blog that included a letter to employees from CEO Dylan Jadeja. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 23:34:34 GMT WKTWWHY3CVPGNGTUZOI7TMIPNY https://www.reuters.com/technology/tencents-riot-games-lay-off-about-11-staff-2024-01-22/Reuters商业工作世界
Chinese music student faces US trial for alleged threats to activistA Chinese music student went on trial on Monday on U.S. charges that he harassed an activist who posted fliers at the Berklee College of Music in Boston supporting democracy in China and threatened to report her activities to Chinese law enforcement. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 22:29:45 GMT ONSVBGIJGFNBFD2FAZ6PC5BY6M https://www.reuters.com/legal/chinese-music-student-faces-us-trial-alleged-threats-activist-2024-01-22/Nate Raymond合法的
China's 'lackluster recovery' not having strong effect on US economy -BrainardChina's lackluster economic recovery has not had a particularly strong effect on the U.S. economy given diversification of supply chains over the past years, White House National Economic Council Director Lael Brainard said on Monday. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 19:12:21 GMT RKAEL7TAV5L2PLDS6CDVD5ICBQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us/chinas-lackluster-recovery-not-having-strong-effect-us-economy-brainard-2024-01-22/Reuters市场宏观问题
Explainer: Why is Canada capping foreign students and who will be impacted?Canada on Monday announced a two-year cap on the intake of foreign students after explosive growth in recent years aggravated the country's housing shortage. Last year Canada issued nearly 1 million study permits, about three times that of a decade ago, according to government data. The new proposal will cut the intake by nearly a third. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 18:05:04 GMT YPV3YCES5ZMLFE3RDMYEBDRBRY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/why-is-canada-capping-foreign-students-who-will-be-impacted-2024-01-22/Wa Lone世界美洲
Chinese research vessel heads to Maldives, could concern IndiaA Chinese research vessel is on its way to the Maldives, according to an Indian military official and an independent researcher, as new Maldivian President Mohamed Muizzu deepens ties with Beijing, distancing from New Delhi. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 13:34:28 GMT EHPKW24PQBKSTOVOSDSEOPAGDY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/chinese-research-vessel-heads-maldives-could-concern-india-2024-01-22/Krishn Kaushik世界亚太地区
Exclusive: China lobbies countries to praise its rights record ahead of UN review - diplomatsChina has been lobbying non-Western countries to praise its human rights record ahead of a key U.N. meeting where it will face questions and criticism over its actions in Hong Kong and Xinjiang, according to diplomats and documents. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 11:59:03 GMT JD7KYWHVCRKKTN5MVMQECW2X2A https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-lobbys-countries-praise-its-rights-record-ahead-un-review-diplomats-2024-01-22/Emma Farge世界中国
Foreign auto brands boost exports as China sales remain weak - dataForeign carmakers that have been losing market share to local rivals in China have boosted exports from the world's largest auto market, accounting for more than a fifth of the country's total vehicle exports last year, industry data showed. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 10:53:19 GMT HHSZZRNNSBLK3ELD4XXFKSM6KE https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/foreign-auto-brands-boost-exports-china-sales-remain-weak-data-2024-01-22/Reuters商业汽车与交通
HSBC chair 'confident' on China investment, meets vice president - state mediaChina's Vice President Han Zheng on Monday met with HSBC Chairman Mark Tucker in Beijing and urged the banking giant to deepen cooperation with China to improve Hong Kong's status as a financial centre, the official Xinhua news agency reported. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 10:49:15 GMT VRIW4Q77FVPHXPTTWNNQMO36GY https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/hsbc-chair-confident-china-investment-meets-vice-president-state-media-2024-01-22/Reuters商业金融
China's residential foreclosures increase 43% in 2023The number of foreclosed homes in China rose 43% year-on-year in 2023, according to a private survey on Monday, highlighting a worrying trend of rising mortgage delinquencies amid a sustained property market slump and a patchy economic recovery. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 10:17:18 GMT 2WQXQCTZQVNIHED6SDLKG5RCNE https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/chinas-residential-foreclosures-increase-43-2023-2024-01-22/Reuters市场亚洲市场
Beijing sets 2024 growth target higher despite slowing economyChina's capital city Beijing has set a growth target of around 5% for 2024, surpassing last year's target of above 4.5%, despite expectations of slower growth for the national economy. Mon, 22 Jan 2024 09:57:45 GMT RDPUJCZ5DBM63AAGAJL6COQXHQ https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/beijing-sets-2024-growth-target-higher-despite-slowing-economy-2024-01-22/Reuters市场宏观问题
China, in comic strip, warns of 'overseas' threats to its rare earthsChina's chief intelligence agency posted on social media a comic strip featuring foreign-looking characters secretly extracting rare earths, in a story portraying the country's strategic metals under threat from covetous "overseas organisations". Mon, 22 Jan 2024 09:30:01 GMT OUJQ7WRP7NOGTKFYGRVN6HCCBU https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-comic-strip-warns-overseas-threats-its-rare-earths-2024-01-22/Liz Lee世界中国
